Write-Up Text: The people on social media are discussing many important topics relevant to Australian society today. The issue of affordable housing and tax breaks for property moguls have been brought to the forefront with a new report suggesting most Australians support funding for affordable housing. Meanwhile the government is urged to raise income support for job seekers and single parent payments to address poverty and homelessness in the country. People are also discussing the need to supercharge Australia's clean energy goals through the upcoming Federal budget. Lastly discussions around financial markets debt ceilings and inflation remain important to the online community.
